items.storedescription:
4" Curved Silicone Squeegee: This squeegee measures 4" x 3" and is the perfect size for door cup areas.

High-Quality Silicone Material: Made with high-quality silicone material, these squeegees are durable, flexible, and resistant to heat, chemicals, and abrasion. 

Comfortable Grip: The squeegee's ergonomic handle design provides a comfortable grip, reducing hand fatigue and allowing for extended use. 
 

Order yours today and experience the difference in quality and efficiency.

XPEL

items.storedescription:
5.5" XPEL Branded Silicone Squeegee: This squeegee measures 5.5" x 3" and is the ideal size for larger areas of film application.

High-Quality Silicone Material: Made with high-quality silicone material, these squeegees are durable, flexible, and resistant to heat, chemicals, and abrasion. 

Double-Tapered Spade Edge: The double-tapered spade edge design allows for precise and efficient application of automotive film, ensuring a smooth and bubble-free finish. 

Comfortable Grip: The squeegee's ergonomic handle design provides a comfortable grip, reducing hand fatigue and allowing for extended use. 

Our XPEL-branded silicone squeegees are the perfect tool to help you achieve a precise application during paint protection film installation. Order yours today and experience the difference in quality and efficiency!

items.storedescription:
The ultimate window film tool designed by window tinters for window tinters. This tool is an absolute must for any window film installer that bottom loads window film. Order yours today!

Please install the supplied protective film before using the EZ-Tint tool. Please note: XPEL is not liable for damage caused by improper use of EZ-Tint. Use of EZ-Tint without XPEL STEALTH installed is not recommended.
items.storedisplayname2: XPEL EZ-Tint

items.storedescription:
EZ-MINI, the miniature EZ-TINT tool for those hard to reach places.


The ultimate window film tool designed by window tinters for window tinters. This tool is an absolute must for any window film installer that bottom loads window film. Order yours today!

Please install the supplied protective film before using the EZ-MINI tool. Please note: XPEL is not liable for damage caused by improper use of EZ-Mini. Use of EZ-Mini without XPEL STEALTH installed is not recommended.
items.storedisplayname2: XPEL EZ-MINI

items.storedescription:
XPEL Absorbent Installation Mats are perfect for Paint Paint Protection Film installation to keep the installation area dry, or for use with our XPEL Rinse Free Car Wash to prevent excess moisture from dripping onto the floor.

  • Bonded waterproof backing prevents leak-through from above or below
  • Durable, stain-resistant material will last for years
  • Machine washable and dry-able
  • Lightweight and compact for easy storage and transport
  • Adds to professional appearance
  • Great for mobile or showroom installs
  • Absorbs gel and water to keep work area clean
  • Slip resistant backing keeps mat in place
items.storedisplayname2: 30" X 58" Absorbent Mats with XPEL logo

items.storedescription:
The Grit Guard Universal Pad Washer conditions, cleans & dries any type of buffer or polisher pad. By cleaning your old pad, you increase buffing effectiveness, ease of use, eliminate contaminants, prolong the life, and save money. The Universal Pad Washer works on foam pads, wool pads, buffing balls, buffing bonnets, felt discs, felt flap wheels, microfiber applicators, and more. The Universal Pad Washer also keeps the backing of your pad dry while cleaning the pad. By keeping the backing dry, it keeps the foam from getting wet and causing damage while cleaning. Features convenient Gamma Seal Lid provides watertight portability to any job site. Includes a sample 4oz bottle of Pad Renewal Solution (PRS).

Universal Pad Washer Instruction Manual
http://www.gritguard.com/v/vspfiles/downloadables/UPW_Manual_R5_web.pdf
items.storedisplayname2: Universal Pad Washer (includes 4oz Bottle of Pad Renewing Solution)

items.storedescription: The Grit Guard Pad Renewing Solution is a concentrated formula that quickly breaks down petroleum and water-based compounds on your buffing pad. Only 2-3 sprays directly on the pad breaks down and releases dried and hardened compounds on your old pad and allows them to be easily cleaned with the Universal Pad Washer for a restored, like new condition. Solution is also a great general-purpose cleaner for jobs around the office, home, or shop. Safe on any surface, non-hazardous, non-corrosive and leaves no residue.
items.storedisplayname2: Pad Renewing Solution (PRS) – 16oz

items.storedescription: The Grit Guard Pad Renewing Solution is a concentrated formula that quickly breaks down petroleum and water-based compounds on your buffing pad. Only 2-3 sprays directly on the pad breaks down and releases dried and hardened compounds on your old pad and allows them to be easily cleaned with the Universal Pad Washer for a restored, like new condition. Solution is also a great general-purpose cleaner for jobs around the office, home, or shop. Safe on any surface, non-hazardous, non-corrosive and leaves no residue.
items.storedisplayname2: Pad Renewing Solution (PRS) – 1 Gallon
